name: Princess Nenne Escape - Eng
description:
Hi, I present to you the video game made by me and my daughter "Princess Nenne Escape":

The game is a maze game with 30 levels and 3 bosses (levels 10-20-30).

EASTER EGG AND SECRET AREA
There are 2 easter eggs and a "different" secret area from the other levels (you should be able to find them, keep in mind that you can take everything you see even if at first sight it seems impossible). If you have trouble finding these things let me know that I help you.

CHEATS:
When the game is won the tricks are revealed to the player, however for those who want to advance them now:
- For all the tricks you have to hold the "Q" and press ...
- "P" to add a life (max 99)
- "O" to increase energy to 100% (if it is not already)
- "L" to go forward one level (not in the menus)
- "K" to go back one level (not in the menus)

Let me know in the comments who can finish it without cheats ... and find everything.
